Incorporate a GPS tracker into the keychain to keep track of its location and help with navigation.
Integrate a smart lock feature into the keychain, allowing users to remotely lock and unlock their doors or other devices.
Add a wireless charging pad to the keychain to keep it powered on the go.
Include a built-in LED flashlight on the keychain for use in dark situations.
Integrate a fingerprint or facial recognition sensor into the keychain to provide an added layer of security.
